author: vwong19
title: 3 Minifigs + 3 Separate Grey Magnet Pieces
review: I'm glad this set came out since I missed the early lego sets with Boba Fett and Princess Leia. The minifigs are completely normal and they each come with special grey magnet pieces that they stand on. $5 per minifig is expensive, but considering what they went for on the after market prior to this set's release, it's priced fairly. I'll use the magnets for some other figures that I have extras of.

author: legorebel21
title: very happy
review:
It's a good thing lego came up with the magnet sets because it's the best way to get rare minifigs. But it is a little pricey. 

PROS
Rare Minifigs
Cool details

CONS
A little pricey









Overall it is a must-have for rare minifig collectors.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Magnets - Magnet Set Royal Guard 2009
review:
The Magnet Set Royal Guard 2009 set (852552) is a LEGO Magnets set which came out in 2009. It comes with 3 basic minifigures which you can take off the magnet and 15 pieces.

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/852552-1.jpg[/img]

Minifigure:

Princess Leia Organa: Princess Leia Organa comes with her sail barge outfit. She has brown hair and red lipstick markings on her face. She comes with her half naked outfit and a tan bra.

Boba Fett: Boba Fett is a very popular character in the Star Wars movies. His helmet has some brown and yellow markings and he also has a jetpack which is attached to his helmet. Boba has a black head under his helmet and a blaster. He has gray legs and a brown belt and he comes with gray arms and dark gray hands. His torso has a green armor.

Royal Guard: The royal guard looks a little bit like a ninja with his mask. Under his red mask he got a black face. This minifig has black hands, red pants, red arms, a red cape and a red torso with some markings on it. He also has a spear in his hand.

Positive:


  • Minifigures (I didn't have any of them before)
  • Nice army builder
  • Magnet does really work

Negative:


  • A little bit overpriced

All in all it's a great set to get and I would highly recommend you to get this set. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure.

When I got my galery uploaded you may check out my own website to see the pictures of this model. At the moment I can't show you the full galery because my server is too small and I'm trying to get a bigger one. Here is the link where you can check out this galery: http://www.klokriecher.de

author: gjamesaustin2000
title: Good set but the price....
review:
First of all, I walked into the Concord Mills Mall in NC, and browsed the LSW section. Then.... THE MAGNET SET! I knew that that was the only time im gonna get old Boba Fett, Best set with Leia Slave, and cheapest way to get the Royal Guard.

Pros:
BOBA FETT!
Tan Leia(Which is rare!)
Royal Guard(EXCLUSIVE!) 
Cons:
Its like 5 bucks  for each figure!
 Besides that...... Buy It!
